column1: Uchi////The cons: the food.  My fiance and I went craving top notch sushi
column2: and we walked away unsatisfied. I don't know what is worse: their claimed tapas style dishes to be shared that turned out to be a meager bite per person
column3: or their "sashimi" that wreaked of a fishy taste. Two dishes worth mentioning. First
column5: which actually contained a surprisingly delectable citric flavor. The Salmon
column7: and kale combo meshed very well together. Au contraire
column8: the chef's selection sashimi tasting was an utter let down.  Each piece of fish wreaked
column9: and tasted like it had been sitting in the freezer for days.
